name: etesync
description: EteSync Server provides a self-hosted backend for secure, end-to-end encrypted contacts, calendars, and tasks. It works with EteSync clients to keep personal information synchronized across devices while preserving privacy.

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Contacts and calendars encrypted on device. Zero-knowledge privacy

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Keep data synchronized across all devices. Seamless access everywhere

features.title: Caldav & Carddav
features.description: Standard protocols for compatibility. Works with existing apps

features.title: End-to-End Encryption
features.description: Encrypted to-do lists and tasks. Private productivity

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Run your own sync server. Complete data sovereignty
